General.Name: Toshiba Tec Corporation
General.Description: Toshiba Tec Corporation develops, manufactures, sells, and maintains retail and workplace solutions. The company operates through Retail Solutions Business and Workplace Solutions Business segments. It offers point-of-sale (POS) systems, printers, peripherals, self-checkout systems, and displays, as well as POS applications, operating systems, commerce platforms, and system management software solutions. The company provides desktop and mobile printers, industrial and color printers, and industrial desktop printers; inkjet heads solutions; and color, monochrome, and hybrid MFP solutions, as well as mobile and cloud solutions, workflow and management solutions, and security solutions. In addition, the company offers digital signage solutions, and engineering manufacturing services. It operates in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Chile, England, France, Germany, Spain, Switzerland, Belgium, Italy, the Netherlands, Sweden, Finland, Poland, Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, China, Australia, South Korea, Thailand, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan. Toshiba Tec Corporation is a subsidiary of Toshiba Corporation.
General.Address: Gate City Ohsaki West Tower, Tokyo, Japan, 141-8562
